seo: mongo-express,远程命令执行漏洞,CVE-2020-24391,检测插件
summary: 该插件用于检测mongo-express是否存在CVE-2020-24391远程命令执行漏洞，通过发送特定请求验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether mongo-express has the CVE-2020-24391 remote command execution vulnerability by sending specific requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
